item.title: Comparing a transformer-based detector with a classical detector
item.description: Table Of Contents ğŸ”¥ Motivation ğŸ”« Dataset Description ğŸ”© Set-Up ğŸ©ºResults ğŸ‘ Coco Metric CNN ğŸ‘ Coco Metric Transformers ğŸ™ Comments & Feedback Follow me ğŸ‘‡ ğŸ”¥ Motivation Link to heading Since the introduction, by Facebook, Transformer based detectors are getting a lot of traction in Computer Vision and Object Detection. In this blog, I will show how a partially trained detector using SWIN transformer backbone leads to a very competitive performance compared to a fully trained classical detector.
